br.uff.tempo.middleware.management
Class ResourceNSContainer

java.lang.Object
  br.uff.tempo.middleware.management.ResourceNSContainer

public class ResourceNSContainer
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to save local instances of any SmartAndroid device
